testsuite.name: using googles search api

testcase.name: query of multiple terms via googles api

testsuite.system-out:
Feature: using googles search api As a google user I want to search google via their api to validate the search result without a browser
--Output from query of a single term via googles search api--
--Output from query of a single term via googles search api--
Scenario: query of a single term via googles search api # GoogleAPI_Search.feature:6 Given I query google via their api # Google_Steps.groovy:8 Then a result is returned # Google_Steps.groovy:13
Scenario Outline: query of multiple terms via googles api # GoogleAPI_Search.feature:10 Given I query google for "<query>" Then google will return a result with "<query>"
Examples:
--Output from query of multiple terms via googles api--
--Output from query of multiple terms via googles api--
Scenario Outline: query of multiple terms via googles api # GoogleAPI_Search.feature:16 Given I query google for "cucumber" # Google_Steps.groovy:19 Then google will return a result with "cucumber" # Google_Steps.groovy:24
